TestInformation.Title: Timed Wasmer Compilation
TestInformation.Description: This test times how long it takes to compile Wasmer. Wasmer is written in the Rust programming language and is a WebAssembly runtime implementation that supports WASI and EmScripten. This test profile builds Wasmer with the Cranelift and Singlepast compiler features enabled.
TestInformation.SubTitle: Time To Compile
